tasks.label: C++: Build and Run
args: if (!(Test-Path '.temp')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Name '.temp' | Out-Null }; g++ -fdiagnostics-color=always -g '${file}' -o '.temp\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe'; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Write-Host '=== Program Output ===' -ForegroundColor Green; & '.temp\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe'; Write-Host '=== Program Finished ===' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host 'Compilation Failed!' -ForegroundColor Red }
tasks.detail: Build and run current C++ file (hide exe files)
